about_the_game:
Questions, concerns, suggestions, curiosities?
▓▒░ JOIN THE COMMUNITY ░▒▓

A simple porn game I've been working on with Vampire Survivor-like gameplay and animated pixel-style sex scenes.

Planned updates (after Salvor DEEP's v1.0 release.)
- Gallery mode
- Unlimited chest size
- Permanently active status image
- Extra area (More animations) (Another clothing set)

My second project is planned to be released on Steam as well, if you would like to learn more about this project's early access progress, check out my discord!



STORY
Frau and her friends talk about how they could not stay the night in a haunted house. Frau doesn't believe in ghosts, so she said she would spend the night alone at an abandoned school nearby to prove that ghosts don't exist.

But as soon as she entered the school at night, she realized she was not alone. Seems a lot of homeless people lived there too, or are they ghosts?



Contains:

31 Encounters!
22 Animations!
4 Clothing sets!
10 abilities to choose from with infinite levels!
12 Areas with hidden loot and rooms!



Note: ALL doors are one-way in this game: the grey side requires a key, and the black side is free.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature content contains depictions of the following events in a shallow/unserious setting:
- Breast Expansion
- Blowjob
- Dubious consent
- Handjob
- Nudity
- Sexual intercourse
- Titfuck

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey, Big Sur
  • Processor: 4-core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated Intel graphics, AMD Radeon, NVIDIA GPUs
  • Storage: 65 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Base specs I could find, most of this is not tested, if you can't run it on any of this let me know.

name: Curse of Dares

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Core i3 6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: R7 260X, GT 730
  • Storage: 65 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Base specs I could find.
